Tomcc：

I'm starting to think that VR is much more about controls than viewing, can't wait for all

HMDs to have motion controls and hand tracking:)


Kappische：

@_tomcc CH currently it is about cable management :p


Tomcc：

@Kappische yeah, the cable really sucked.. someone needs to make a all-in-one.

Tomcc：

Obligatory "Budget Cuts is awesome" tweet: I played it yesterday on @Dinnerbone's

Vive, best closet searching ever 10/10

Tomcc：
我开始认为相比于仅仅观看画面，VR应当在控制上有更多作为，我们不能等到左右HMD（头戴设备）都拥有运动控制和手势感应功能后再去行动。


Kappische：
然而目前的问题是线缆管理

Tomcc：
没错，线缆的确很乱..必须将其一体化
